thread.title: See stunning images shortlisted for Sony World Photography Awards 2017
thread.title_full: See stunning images shortlisted for Sony World Photography Awards 2017

author: Rhian Lubin
title: See stunning images shortlisted for Sony World Photography Awards 2017

organizations.name: united states of america professional natural world

text:
See stunning images shortlisted for Sony World Photography Awards 2017 The collection can be seen at Somerset House, central London next month Share Get daily   
A school of fish churns up the sea bed, creating a tornado effect under the water. 
Snapper Christian Vizl's striking image has been shortlisted in the Sony World Photography Awards. 
Christian said: “Each image is a visualisation of that sublime moment whereupon the beautiful marine life around me is frozen majestically in its natural environment.” 
Alex Andriesi’s photograph of a girl holding a ball is shortlisted for the Open Enhanced category. 
Meanwhile, Andreas Hemb’s image of a herd of cape buffalo in Kwa-Zulu Natal, South Africa, is up for the Open Wildlife category in the 2017 awards. 
All can be seen at Somerset House, central London next month. 
See the incredible images below...
